item.title: Need help with a idea
item.dc:creator: @sjoerd135 sjoerd135
item.description:
@sjoerd135 wrote:

hello i got a idea for my server but i dont know how to make it

can the start ammor random for each player? like

first player

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=1042; playerEquipment[playerCape]=6570; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=5553; playerEquipment[playerShield]=1187; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=5555; playerEquipment[playerHands]=775; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=1837; playerEquipment[playerRing]=6737; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;
for 2e player

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=1048; playerEquipment[playerCape]=6570; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=5553; playerEquipment[playerShield]=1187; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=5555; playerEquipment[playerHands]=775; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=1837; playerEquipment[playerRing]=6737; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=4151;
